headline: How Much Upside is Left in Cognizant (CTSH)? Wall Street Analysts Think 25.68%
summary: The mean of analysts' price targets for Cognizant (CTSH) points to a 25.7% upside in the stock. While this highly sought-after metric has not proven reasonably effective, strong agreement among analysts in raising earnings estimates does indicate an upside in the stock.

headline: CEO of IT firm with 350K workers says AI will create more entry level jobs—and he’s recruiting liberal arts graduates
summary: Ravi Kumar S of Cognizant Technology Solutions says AI will widen the base of corporate employment and ‘the path to expertise is going to be faster.’
